languages.text: "Я, проктор Соломон Антар, свидетельствую союзу Вольного Торговца и Адептус Арбитес, и славлю держател{mf|я|ьницу} священного Патента в день вступления в законные права". {n}Соломон с глухим стуком прижимает кулак к груди, и толпа заходится восторженным ревом.{/n}
languages.translation_comment: Соломон, анимация Salut_Full_v1. Нужны кондишны на его выбор
Соломон, анимация Salut_Full_v1. Нужны кондишны на его выбор

languages.text: "I, Proctor Solomorne Anthar, bear witness to the alliance between the Rogue Trader and the Adeptus Arbites, and praise the bearer of the sacred Warrant on the day of {mf|his|her} lawful inauguration." {n}Solomorne presses his fist to his chest with a low thud, and the crowd bursts into a fervent roar.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Я, проктор Соломон Антар, свидетельствую союзу Вольного Торговца и Адептус Арбитес, и славлю держател{mf|я|ьницу} священного Патента в день вступления в законные права". {n}Соломон с глухим стуком прижимает кулак к груди, и толпа заходится восторженным ревом.{/n}

languages.text: 「私、ソロモーン・アンサール代理人は、ローグトレーダーと高等裁定局との同盟をここに証言し、聖なる令状の所有者を、その正統なる就任の日に称える」{n}ソロモーンが拳を胸に打ちつけると、低く鈍い音が響いた。それと同時に、群衆は熱狂的な歓声を上げた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I, Proctor Solomorne Anthar, bear witness to the alliance between the Rogue Trader and the Adeptus Arbites, and praise the bearer of the sacred Warrant on the day of {mf|his|her} lawful inauguration." {n}Solomorne presses his fist to his chest with a low thud, and the crowd bursts into a fervent roar.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「私、ソロモーン・アンサール代理人は、ローグトレーダーと高等裁定局との同盟をここに証言し、聖なる令状の所有者を、その正統なる就任の日に称える」{n}ソロモーンが拳を胸に打ちつけると、低く鈍い音が響いた。それと同時に、群衆は熱狂的な歓声を上げた。{/n}

languages.text: "Ich, Proktor Solomorne Anthar, bezeuge das Bündnis zwischen {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} und den Adeptus Arbites, und preise {mf|den Träger des heiligen Handelsbriefs am Tag seines|die Trägerin des heiligen Handelsbriefs am Tag ihres} rechtmäßigen Amtsantritts." {n}Solomorne schlägt sich mit einem dumpfen Klopfen die Faust gegen die Brust, und die Menge stößt ein inbrünstiges Geschrei aus.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I, Proctor Solomorne Anthar, bear witness to the alliance between the Rogue Trader and the Adeptus Arbites, and praise the bearer of the sacred Warrant on the day of {mf|his|her} lawful inauguration." {n}Solomorne presses his fist to his chest with a low thud, and the crowd bursts into a fervent roar.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ich, Proktor Solomorne Anthar, bezeuge das Bündnis zwischen {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} und den Adeptus Arbites, und preise {mf|den Träger des heiligen Handelsbriefs am Tag seines|die Trägerin des heiligen Handelsbriefs am Tag ihres} rechtmäßigen Amtsantritts." {n}Solomorne schlägt sich mit einem dumpfen Klopfen die Faust gegen die Brust, und die Menge stößt ein inbrünstiges Geschrei aus.{/n}

languages.text: « Moi, le proctor Solomorne Anthar, suis témoin de l'alliance entre {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} et l'Adeptus Arbites, et présente mes félicitations {mf|au détenteur|à la détentrice} de la lettre de marque sacrée à l'heure de son intronisation légitime. » {n}Solomorne presse son poing contre son cœur, puis un rugissement de ferveur éclate dans l'assemblée.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I, Proctor Solomorne Anthar, bear witness to the alliance between the Rogue Trader and the Adeptus Arbites, and praise the bearer of the sacred Warrant on the day of {mf|his|her} lawful inauguration." {n}Solomorne presses his fist to his chest with a low thud, and the crowd bursts into a fervent roar.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Moi, le proctor Solomorne Anthar, suis témoin de l'alliance entre {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} et l'Adeptus Arbites, et présente mes félicitations {mf|au détenteur|à la détentrice} de la lettre de marque sacrée à l'heure de son intronisation légitime. » {n}Solomorne presse son poing contre son cœur, puis un rugissement de ferveur éclate dans l'assemblée.{/n}

languages.text: «Yo, el Procurador Solomorne Anthar, doy fe de la alianza entre {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente y el Adeptus Arbites, y rindo homenaje {mf|al portador|a la portadora} de la sagrada Patente en el día de su legítimo nombramiento». {n}Solomorne se golpea el pecho con el puño, y la multitud prorrumpe en una estentórea ovación.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I, Proctor Solomorne Anthar, bear witness to the alliance between the Rogue Trader and the Adeptus Arbites, and praise the bearer of the sacred Warrant on the day of {mf|his|her} lawful inauguration." {n}Solomorne presses his fist to his chest with a low thud, and the crowd bursts into a fervent roar.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Yo, el Procurador Solomorne Anthar, doy fe de la alianza entre {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente y el Adeptus Arbites, y rindo homenaje {mf|al portador|a la portadora} de la sagrada Patente en el día de su legítimo nombramiento». {n}Solomorne se golpea el pecho con el puño, y la multitud prorrumpe en una estentórea ovación.{/n}

languages.text: “我，索罗蒙·安萨监察官，亲眼见证了行商浪人与帝国法务部之间的盟约，在{mf|他|她}合法合规的加冕典礼上，赞颂这位神圣授状的持有者。”{n}索罗蒙将拳头按在胸前，以低沉、洪亮的声音开了口。人群爆发出了热烈的吼声。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I, Proctor Solomorne Anthar, bear witness to the alliance between the Rogue Trader and the Adeptus Arbites, and praise the bearer of the sacred Warrant on the day of {mf|his|her} lawful inauguration." {n}Solomorne presses his fist to his chest with a low thud, and the crowd bursts into a fervent roar.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我，索罗蒙·安萨监察官，亲眼见证了行商浪人与帝国法务部之间的盟约，在{mf|他|她}合法合规的加冕典礼上，赞颂这位神圣授状的持有者。”{n}索罗蒙将拳头按在胸前，以低沉、洪亮的声音开了口。人群爆发出了热烈的吼声。{/n}

languages.text: "Üsteğmen Solomorne Anthar olarak Hür Tacir ile Adeptus Arbites arasındaki ittifaka tanıklık ediyor ve Kutsal Ruhsatname'nin Hamili'nin meşru olarak görevine başladığı güne şükrediyorum." {n}Solomorne, yumruğunu alçak bir gümbürtüyle göğsüne bastırıyor. Bunun üzerine kalabalık da coşkuyla kükrüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I, Proctor Solomorne Anthar, bear witness to the alliance between the Rogue Trader and the Adeptus Arbites, and praise the bearer of the sacred Warrant on the day of {mf|his|her} lawful inauguration." {n}Solomorne presses his fist to his chest with a low thud, and the crowd bursts into a fervent roar.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Üsteğmen Solomorne Anthar olarak Hür Tacir ile Adeptus Arbites arasındaki ittifaka tanıklık ediyor ve Kutsal Ruhsatname'nin Hamili'nin meşru olarak görevine başladığı güne şükrediyorum." {n}Solomorne, yumruğunu alçak bir gümbürtüyle göğsüne bastırıyor. Bunun üzerine kalabalık da coşkuyla kükrüyor.{/n}
